title: Top Places to visit in Gavaravaram, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Gavaravaram is a census town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in the Eluru Mandal of the Eluru revenue division. The town is a constituent of Eluru urban agglomeration.

 

Demographics

As of 2011 Census of India, Gavaravaram had a population of 10,029. The total population constitute, 4,927 males and 5,102 females —a sex ratio of 1036 females per 1000 males. 761 children are in the age group of 0–6 years, with a child sex ratio of 816 girls per 1000 boys. The average literacy rate stands at 94.18% with 8,729 literates.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools is English, Telugu.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gavaravaram

recommendations.content: Kavali is the second-largest city in the Nellore district of Andhra Pradesh of India. It is one of the major cities in Andhra Pradesh. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Chittoor is a city and district headquarters in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is also the mandal and divisional headquarters of Chittoor mandal and Chittoor revenue division, respectively. The city has a population of 2,89,625 and that of the agglomeration is 3,53,76

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
